data.eml:eml: A new species of the rare nematode genus Paramicrolaimus Wieser, 1954 (Chromadorida: Paramicrolaimidae) from the south eastern Arabian Sea

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jacob, Jini, Jaleel, Abdul, Vijayan, Anil Kumar (2015): A new species of the rare nematode genus Paramicrolaimus Wieser, 1954 (Chromadorida: Paramicrolaimidae) from the south eastern Arabian Sea. Zootaxa 3904 (4): 563-571, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3904.4.5
